foreignData.name: Interplanarer Signalturm
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn du einen Planeswalkerzauber wirkst, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{1}, {T}: Erzeuge zwei Mana in unterschiedlichen Farben. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um Planeswalkerzauber zu wirken.

foreignData.name: Almenara interplanar
foreignData.text:
Siempre que lances un hechizo de planeswalker, ganas 1 vida.
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{1}, {T}: Agrega dos manás de colores distintos. Usa este maná solo para lanzar hechizos de planeswalker.

foreignData.name: Flambeau interplanaire
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort de planeswalker, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{1}, {T} : Ajoutez deux manas de couleurs différentes. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer des sorts de planeswalker.

foreignData.name: Faro Interplanare
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia planeswalker, guadagni 1 punto vita.
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{1}, {T}: Aggiungi due mana di colori diversi. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare magie planeswalker.

foreignData.name: 次元間の標
foreignData.text:
あなたがプレインズウォーカー・呪文を唱えるたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{T}：{C}を加える。
{1}, {T}：異なる色のマナ２点を加える。このマナは、プレインズウォーカー・呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。

foreignData.name: 차원을 잇는 봉화
foreignData.text:
당신이 플레인즈워커 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{T}: {C}를 추가한다.
{1}, {T}: 서로 다른 색인 마나 두 개를 추가한다. 이 마나는 플레인즈워커 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Farol Interplanar
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica de planeswalker, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{1}, {T}: Adicione dois manas de cores diferentes. Gaste este mana apenas para conjurar mágicas de planeswalker.

foreignData.name: Межмировой Маяк
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание planeswalker-а, вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{1}, {T}: добавьте две маны различных цветов. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинаний planeswalker-ов.

foreignData.name: 跨时空信标
foreignData.text:
每当你施放鹏洛客咒语时，你获得1点生命。
{T}：加{C}。
{1}，{T}：加两点不同颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放鹏洛客咒语。

foreignData.name: 跨時空信標
foreignData.text:
每當你施放鵬洛客咒語時，你獲得1點生命。
{T}：加{C}。
{1}，{T}：加兩點不同顏色的魔法力。此魔法力只能用來施放鵬洛客咒語。

name: Interplanar Beacon
originalText:
Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

rulings.text: Interplanar Beacon’s first ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
Both mana produced by Interplanar Beacon’s last ability may be spent on the same planeswalker spell, or each may be spent on different planeswalker spells.

text:
Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.
